summary: Implements a non‑recursive, in‑place transformer that mutates a tree structure directly instead of constructing new nodes, allowing the processing of very large hierarchical data with minimal memory consumption.
business_intent: Provide a memory‑efficient way to apply transformations to massive trees (such as abstract syntax trees or document object models) where copying the structure would be prohibitive, enabling high‑performance data manipulation in resource‑constrained environments.
